title: Still have Connection problem
body:
Is that real?  I still have connection problem after riot said they solved the problem.

I was still Unable to connect to the server with unknown reason.
I tried to reconnect several times but it is still the same.
It even happens when I start a custom game.

How can I solve the problem?

replies.body: What OS are you on and who's your ISP?
Have you tried running League with all of your firewalls and anti-viruses (including Windows services) disabled?
